format: Makefile.include or Bitbake recipe (bb or meta-configuration)
description: This file is a Bitbake recipe fragment (likely .inc file) configuring the build process for Cargo, a Rust package manager, within a Yocto/OE build environment. It specifies dependencies, build steps, and other build metadata related to Cargo.

methods.name: do_cargo_setup_snapshot
methods.description: Sets up the cargo snapshot by executing an install script and possibly adjusting the interpreter with patchelf.

methods.name: addtask cargo_setup_snapshot
methods.description: Registers the cargo_setup_snapshot task to run after do_unpack and before do_configure.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Prepares environment variable RUSTC_BOOTSTRAP for building cargo with bootstrap enabled.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Copies the compiled cargo binary into the target directory defined by 'bindir'.
